title: PBE Guinsoo's and Gunblade are absurd on Jax
body:
I can't even describe the amount of damage and absurd healing this has

Gunblade's passive now heals all damage done which includes guinsoo's on hit 

Guinsoo's at max stacks alone gives more AS than Bork and Trinity combined

replies.body: GEE, ALMOST AS IF WE HAVE A PBE BOARDS FOR THIS KIND OF FEEDBACK.
stop waving this around. riot listens but dosent do anything about it.
Maybe they don't listen to your feedback because IT'S IN THE WRONG FUCKING FORUMS
Nah they don't listen either way. I think you forgot to take your medication btw.

If I didn't take my medication I'd be dead.

Livin with Diabetes boys

but he doesn't have sheen damage
he doesn't have bonus ms
he doesn't have %hp damage

shut up now, jax will be like before massive hybrid damage and healing which makes him good at 1v1
his teamfighting will always be high risk high reward, and his damage on tanks was lowered

Make sure you place all feedback for the PBE on the PBE boards. This prevents confusion between the live servers vs. PBE servers. :P
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/
Here's the link for you.

Well, since Trinity lost the AP and a bunch of the AS in exchange for Crit and CDR... Well, Jax needed somethin' to help with it. Plus BotRK got nerfed too, so this makes Gunblade a viable option again, used to be his go-to pre-BotRK.
Shouldn't this be on the PBE forum?  You know, where feedback on PBE things goes?
